EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCF Roadshow_Q314.Email Reminder - Singapore
EmailTemplate.subject: See you Thursday 11/6 at the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop - Singapore
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop coming up this Thursday in Singapore. We look forward to seeing you!
Please bring your laptop and power cord to fully participate in this hands-on workshop. A Mac or Linux environment is ideal. For the best workshop experience, please prep your laptop prior to attending following the “Workshop Prerequisites” listed below.
Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop Thursday, November 6, 2014 1:30pm - 7:00pm (tea break & happy hour) Workshop Agenda <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/singapore>
IDA Lab @ National Design Center #03-04 111 Middle Road Singapore Driving Directions <https://www.google.com/maps/place/National+Design+Centre/@1.298824,103.853511,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x31da19bad62a795f:0xebd6bcfaf5795f03>
WORKSHOP PREREQUISITES All Hands-on Sections
- Git <http://git-scm.com/downloads> ("brew install git") - A GitHub <https://github.com> account - Your favorite Java editor (Eclipse, IntelliJ IDEA, Netbeans) - The Cloud Foundry CLI <https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cli/releases> - download the latest!
- A FREE account on Pivotal Web Services - create a 60-day trial with no credit card at https://run.pivotal.io
QUESTIONS? Contact us. <mailto:info@pivotal.io>
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
P.S.- Only a few spots remain! If you have a colleague interested in attending please forward on this link to the workshop details & registration <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/singapore>.
